meanings.sent1: She is papering the walls in her bedroom.
meanings.sent2: I will start papering the gift boxes for the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat is papering the floor with shredded newspaper.
meanings.sent4: The snow was papering the ground with a blanket of white.
meanings.sent5: The artist was papering the canvas with colorful designs.

meanings.sent1: They are papering the living room with a floral pattern.

meanings.sent4: The stars were papering the night sky with their twinkling light.
